name: This Game is Wacked
description:
A 3D platformer where random game elements go missing! (e.g. gravity, platforms, etc).

Made in 48 hrs for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018, where the theme was "Genre without a Mechanic"

Only 6 levels available and didnt have enough time to add a "win" screen.  I actually only spent about a day working on it.  Tried to also enjoy my long weekend!

**best played with a controller!

Questions or comments, reach me on twitter @JerryAviles

The character mesh is from the asset store but all animations are my own.  

Source: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/chibi-characters-87715
